name: Little Thief
description:
Little Thief is a game that you can play on Nintendo Game Boy.

This game was made in 7 days for Game Boy Showdown using GB Studio.

You're able to play the game on the HTML5 version, an Emulator or your Game Boy.

Controls for the HTML5 version:

Up - Up Arrow / W
Down - Down Arrow / S
Left - Left Arrow / A
Right - Right Arrow / D
A - Alt / Z / J
B - Ctrl / K / X
Start - Enter
Select - Shift

Hope you enjoy it!
